item.title: 关于我
item.description: Hi there! 🎒 I am an undergraduate student in Nanchang University (majoring in computer science, grade 2019). 💻 I’m working on some private projects for my school. 👬 I’m working on Internet projects with friends in a cozy “family” @NCUHOME 🏠! 📚 I’m learning about WEB backend development and part of the DevOps. GithHub Stats More GitHub
item.content:
Hi there!

  • 🎒 I am an undergraduate student in Nanchang University (majoring in computer science, grade 2019).
  • 💻 I’m working on some private projects for my school.
  • 👬 I’m working on Internet projects with friends in a cozy “family” @NCUHOME 🏠!
  • 📚 I’m learning about WEB backend development and part of the DevOps.
